description: The description domain provides a textual description of the BioCompute Object (BCO).

methodology.description: Describes the methodology used for measuring copies of DUF1220 domains and the NBPF genes.

effect_of_parameters.description: Characterizes the effect of various sequencing and alignment parameters on the accuracy and precision of the method.

levels_of_resolution.description: Describes the levels of resolution at which DUF1220 copy number can be measured.

impact_of_sequencing_parameters.description: Evaluates the impact of sequencing parameters, such as read length and paired-end reads, on the quantification of DUF1220 copies.

results.description: Summarizes the key results obtained from the analysis of DUF1220 copy numbers.
